content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Ancient page
This article is about the pages from My notes. For the pages used to create the Book of darkness, see Ancient page (God page).

Ancient pages are pages found within the Ancient Cavern that can be added to My notes. There are 26 different pages that can be found. Rummaging skeletons gives a 1/13 chance of receiving an ancient page, while the spirits and skeletons have a 5/128 (1/25.6) chance of dropping them. In addition, mithril dragons have a 1/64 chance of dropping them. Brutal green dragons do not drop the pages.

Because they are fairly uncommon drops, and the fact that duplicate pages can be obtained, my notes can take several hours to complete. A good strategy on claiming ancient pages is to rummage the three skeletons found on the lower level, and hopping to another world.

Page 10 Written hastily.
Page 11 Fragile parchment.

Page 13 Hastily scrawled.
Page 14 The writer needed spelling lessons.
Page 15 I wonder who dropped this.
Page 16 It may have had an important seal once.
Page 17 Part of someone's homework?
Page 18 Damp and close to disintegration.
Page 19 It looks pretty old.
Page 20 Lucky they used waterproof ink.
Page 21 Could a dragon have written this?
Page 22 Tatty.
Page 23 Has both sorts of watermark.
Page 24 Smells disgusting.
Page 25 Tiny writing.
Page 26 The paper glows with some odd mould.

'''Ancient pages''' are pages found within the [[Ancient Cavern]] that can be added to [[My notes]]. There are 26 different pages that can be found. Rummaging skeletons gives a 1/13 chance of receiving an ancient page, while the spirits and skeletons have a 5/128 (1/25.6) chance of dropping them. In addition, [[mithril dragon]]s have a 1/64 chance of dropping them. [[Brutal green dragon]]s do '''not''' drop the pages.

Because they are fairly uncommon drops, and the fact that duplicate pages can be obtained, [[my notes]] can take several hours to complete. A good strategy on claiming ancient pages is to rummage the three skeletons found on the lower level, and [[World switching|hopping to another world]].
